name: uri-encoder-decoder
title: Uri Encoder & Decoder
description: Simple and fast URI encoding/decoding for URLs and parameters
author: choi2021

commands.name: encode
commands.title: Encode Uri
commands.subtitle: Encode text for URLs
commands.description: Encodes text for safe use in URLs and parameters

commands.name: decode
commands.title: Decode Uri
commands.subtitle: Decode encoded text
commands.description: Decodes URL-encoded text back to original

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
